languages.text: "Я сам взрастил этого мальчишку, и обучил убивать его тоже я. Да, Вортен яростен и бесстрашен, но именно таковым и должен быть верный пес".

traits.locale_text: "Я сам взрастил этого мальчишку, и обучил убивать его тоже я. Да, Вортен яростен и бесстрашен, но именно таковым и должен быть верный пес".

languages.text: "I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."
languages.original_text: "Я сам взрастил этого мальчишку, и обучил убивать его тоже я. Да, Вортен яростен и бесстрашен, но именно таковым и должен быть верный пес".

traits.locale_text: "I raised that boy and taught him to kill myself. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but that's just how a loyal dog has to be."
"I raised that boy and taught him to kill myself. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but that's just how a loyal dog has to be."
"I raised that boy and taught him to kill myself. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but that's just how a loyal dog has to be."
"I raised that boy and taught him to kill myself. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but that's just how a loyal dog has to be."
"I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."
"I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."

languages.text: «Yo mismo he criado a este muchacho y le he enseñado a matar. Sí, Worten es audaz y fiero, pero así es como ha de ser un perro fiel».
languages.original_text: "I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."

traits.locale_text: «Yo mismo he criado a este muchacho y le he enseñado a matar. Sí, Worten es audaz y fiero, pero así es como ha de ser un perro fiel».

languages.text: “是我一手把这孩子养大，教他如何杀戮。没错，沃尔腾无所畏惧，勇猛凶残，但这正是忠犬该有的样子。”
languages.original_text: "I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."

traits.locale_text: “是我一手把这孩子养大，教他如何杀戮。没错，沃尔腾无所畏惧，勇猛凶残，但这正是忠犬该有的样子。”

languages.text: « J'ai élevé ce garçon et je lui ai appris à tuer. Certes, Worten est intrépide et féroce, mais c'est ce que l'on attend d'un bon chien fidèle. »
languages.original_text: "I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai élevé ce garçon et je lui ai appris à tuer. Certes, Worten est intrépide et féroce, mais c'est ce que l'on attend d'un bon chien fidèle. »

languages.text: 「俺はあの少年を育て、自分を殺すことを教えた。確かにヴォルテンは大胆不敵で獰猛だが、それが忠犬に期待されるものだ」
languages.original_text: "I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."

traits.locale_text: 「俺はあの少年を育て、自分を殺すことを教えた。確かにヴォルテンは大胆不敵で獰猛だが、それが忠犬に期待されるものだ」

languages.text: "Ich habe den Jungen großgezogen und ihn gelehrt, zu töten. Ja, Worten ist furchtlos und wild, aber genau das erwartet man von einem treuen Hund."
languages.original_text: "I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe den Jungen großgezogen und ihm selbst das Töten beigebracht. Ja, Worten ist furchtlos und wild, doch so muss ein treuer Hund eben sein."

languages.text: "O çocuğu ben yetiştirdim, ona nasıl öldürüleceğini öğrettim. Evet, Worten korkusuz ve acımasızdır ama sadık bir köpekten beklenen de budur."
languages.original_text: "I raised that boy and taught him how to kill. Yes, Worten is fearless and fierce, but it's just what one would expect from a loyal dog."
